casebody.data:
The RAVENSWOOD INVESTMENT COMPANY, L.P., individually, derivatively and on behalf of a class of similarly situated persons, Plaintiff-Below, Appellant/Cross-Appellee,
v.
The ESTATE OF Bassett S. WINMILL, Thomas B. Winmill, Mark C. Winmill and Winmill & Co. Incorporated, Defendants-Below, Appellees/Cross-Appellants. No. 496, 2018 Supreme Court of Delaware. Submitted: April 24, 2019
Decided: May 3, 2019

AFFIRMED.
